data.text: Nama kaan Sofara yi falan tongo, a naxa,
“Fala wuyaxini itoe yabi mi na ba?
Muxune dundɛ i ya fala ɲaxine bun ma ba?
I a falama, i naxa,
Koni, xa Ala yi waxi falan ti feni nun,
xa a yi a fekolonna wundone fala i xa,
“I nɔɛ Ala miriyane kolonɲɛ?
A mate dangu kore xɔnna ra.
A kuya dangu bɔxɔn na,
Xa Ala fa muxune suxɛ,
Amasɔtɔ, Ala fuyantenne kolon,
Koni, kɔmɔn mi nɔɛ findɛ xaxilimaan na,
“I bɔɲɛn nafindi Ala ma,
i mɛ i hakɛne ra,
Nayi, fɛ mi luma i ra,
I ɲinanma nɛn i ya sɔxɔlɛne ra,
I ya siimayaan makɛnɛnma nɛn
I lannayaan sɔtɔma nɛn,
Muxu yo mi fa i raxulunɲɛ i ya xixɔnli,
Koni, ɲaxudene yɛɛn danxuma nɛn,
